80908.summary: Some customers in the Brookswood area of Langley are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
80908.title: July 22 - Langley (Brookswood) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
